events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the product does not match what I ordered.
The customer's issue has been classified under the Refund cluster due to keywords requesting refund and wrong item received.
The case has been assigned to agent Laura for further handling of the refund request related to the incorrect item shipment.
Hello, this is Laura from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and I am here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide us with your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
My order number is 123456789. Attached is a photo showing that the item I received is completely different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days and provide you with a return label for the incorrect item.
Thank you very much for the prompt response and resolution. I appreciate the quick handling of my refund.
The refund process is now complete, and the customer has been sent the return shipping label. We consider this issue resolved.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and if you need any further assistance from us.
The customer confirmed receipt of the refund and no further issues were reported. The case has been closed successfully.
